snippet: Everything at Miss Terroir bore a hand-made pride of place, distinct in flavor and redolent of origins. It was as far from clichéd brunch fare as I could imagine.
abstract: Everything at Miss Terroir bore a hand-made pride of place, distinct in flavor and redolent of origins. It was as far from clichéd brunch fare as I could imagine.

headline.main: In France, Where Brunch Is Au Courant
